question:
A computer programmer has developed a computer game that they want to release for users to download over the internet. The programmer needs to decide whether to release the game as open source or proprietary software.

Discuss the features, benefits and drawbacks of each type of licence for this program and make a recommendation to the programmer.

You should include the following in your answer:
• features of each licence
• legal and ethical issues of each licence
• benefits and drawbacks of each licence.
context: Computer game development and software licensing

question:
A shopping centre uses CCTV cameras to monitor customers. The shopping centre is considering using AI (Artificial Intelligence) to track individuals as they move around the shopping centre.

Discuss the use of AI to track individuals in a shopping centre.

You should consider:
• the benefits to different groups of people
• the drawbacks to different groups of people
• the ethical issues.

topic: 1.6.2 Ethical issues - AI and social media
question:
A social media platform uses AI (Artificial Intelligence) to monitor posts made by users. The AI automatically removes posts that it considers to contain unacceptable content.

Discuss the use of AI to monitor posts on a social media platform.

You should consider:
• the benefits to different groups of people
• the drawbacks to different groups of people
• the ethical issues.
context: AI content moderation on social media
